text: w'idha lm tjy -ayha alrswl- hwla' almushrikin biayat qalu: hla ahdaththa wakhtlqtha min eind nfsk, qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iina hdha lays ly, wala yajuz li fielh; li'ana allah 'iinama amrny biaitibae ma ywha 'ily min endh, wahu hdha alquran aldhy atlwh ealaykum hjjana wbrahyn min rbkm, wbyanana yahdi almuminin 'iilaa altariq almstqym, warahmat yrhm allah biha eibadih almwmnyn
